00040 enum CBLAS_SIDE {CblasLeft=141, CblasRight=142};

00092 /* zero an array */
00093 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00095 /* number of elements in one triangle of a square matrix of order n */
00096 #define PACKED_LENGTH(n)   ((n) * ((n) + 1))/2

00098 /* duplicate the slot with name given by sym from src to dest */
00099 /* FIXME: is not yet used */
00100 #define slot_dup(dest, src, sym)  SET_SLOT(dest, sym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(src, sym)))
00101 
00102 #define slot_nonNull_dup(dest, src, sym)                        \
00103     if(GET_SLOT(src, sym) != R_NilValue)                        \
00104         SET_SLOT(dest, sym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(src, sym)))

00111 #define uplo_P(_x_) CHAR(STRING_ELT(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_uploSym), 0))
00112 #define diag_P(_x_) CHAR(STRING_ELT(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_diagSym), 0))
00113 #define class_P(_x_) CHAR(asChar(getAttrib(_x_, R_ClassSymbol)))

00115 /* should also work for "matrix" matrices: */
00116 #define Real_KIND(_x_)  (IS_S4_OBJECT(_x_) ? Real_kind(_x_) : \
00117                          (isReal(_x_) ? 0 : (isLogical(_x_) ? 1 : -1)))
00118 
00119 /* requires 'x' slot: */
00120 #define Real_kind(_x_)  (isReal(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_xSym)) ? 0 :       \
00121                          (isLogical(GET_SLOT(_x_, Matrix_xSym)) ? 1 : -1))

00132 static R_INLINE
00133 int packed_ncol(int len)
00134 {
00135     int disc = 8 * len + 1;     /* discriminant */
00136     int sqrtd = (int) sqrt((double) disc);
00137 
00138     if (len < 0 || disc != sqrtd * sqrtd)
00139         error(_("invalid 'len' = %d in packed_ncol"));
00140     return (sqrtd - 1)/2;
00141 }
00142 
00161 static R_INLINE
00162 SEXP ALLOC_SLOT(SEXP obj, SEXP nm, SEXPTYPE type, int length)
00163 {
00164     SEXP val = allocVector(type, length);
00165 
00166     SET_SLOT(obj, nm, val);
00167     return val;
00168 }
00169 
00180 static R_INLINE
00181 int* expand_cmprPt(int ncol, const int mp[], int mj[])
00182 {
00183     int j;
00184     for (j = 0; j < ncol; j++) {
00185         int j2 = mp[j+1], jj;
00186         for (jj = mp[j]; jj < j2; jj++) mj[jj] = j;
00187     }
00188     return mj;
00189 }

00204 static R_INLINE SEXP
00205 mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(SEXP A)
00206 {
00207     return strcmp(class_P(A), "dgeMatrix") ? dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(A) : A;
00208 }
00209 
00210 static R_INLINE SEXP
00211 mMatrix_as_geMatrix(SEXP A)
00212 {
00213     return strcmp(class_P(A) + 1, "geMatrix") ? dup_mMatrix_as_geMatrix(A) : A;
00214 }

00225 static R_INLINE int
00226 Matrix_check_class(const char *class, char **valid)
00227 {
00228     int ans;
00229     for (ans = 0; ; ans++) {
00230         if (!strlen(valid[ans])) return -1;
00231         if (!strcmp(class, valid[ans])) return ans;
00232     }
00233 }
